name: HyperTyper
tagline: A tool for achieving high-scores in typing competitions
body:
### Ready to #HyperType?
HyperTyper is the easiest way to instantly improve your typing abilities. Whether you're looking to improve your average score on a typing competition website, dominate your opponents in a typing race, or get the top spot on a speed typing website, HyperTyper is the utility you need.

To prepare your computer, please run the following in a *nix terminal
```
$ yes '#HyperType'
$ yes HyperTyper
$ sudo su HyperTypeMe
```

Just kidding. HyperTypeMe isn't a command... yet. And those yeses just print out '#HyperType' and 'HyperTyper'. Crtl + C to end those.

### Installation
If you're on Chrome, get the ![HyperTyper on the Chrome Web Store](https://developer.chrome.com/webstore/images/ChromeWebStore_Badge_v2_206x58.png) [HyperTyper Chrome extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hypertyper/emlnlmijjaghanenmpdjdckanpdinpgn).
Otherwise, add a bookmarklet from [script.js](https://github.com/ethanmad/HyperTyper/blob/master/script.js).

### Usage
Using HyperTyper is extremely simple; all you need to do is go to one of the [supported websites] (https://ethanmad.github.io/#Supported+Websites) and click on the checkered flag that appears in your Omnibar/address bar to inject the script. Once the script is injected (you should see the first word of the passage already in the input box), you just need to press space.

### Supported Websites
[TypeRacer] (http://play.typeracer.com)
[10FastFingers] (http://10fastfingers.com)
[Typing Speed Contest] (http://typingspeedcontest.com) - help us flood the leaderboards here!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with HyperTyper? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/ethanmad/HyperTyper or contact me on GitHub and I'll help you sort it out.
